name: Coraloph
description: Coraloph is a regal Pokémon that radiates a beautiful sapphire aura. Its daily activities involve playing and basking in the sun on the warm ocean beds. Its long, agile limbs make it a master of maneuvering the waves, with Wave Strike and Aqua Jet serving as powerful attacks that it will use to defend itself.
image_prompt: Coraloph::0 a water-type monkey pokemon::1.8, wearing a sapphire crown, in a ocean environment, sparkling blue background, anime sketch with watercolor --niji --ar 3:2
